author: Axios
title: Mark Cuban opens door to 2020 presidential run amid coronavirus "reset"
description: Businessman and Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban revived talk of an improbable 2020 presidential bid during an Axios virtual event on Friday. "Everything's a reset right now," Cuban told Axios CEO Jim VandeHei. "If this would would've been a month ago, I wou…
content:
Peer-to-peer (P2P) texting is experiencing a massive uptick in political campaigns throughout the country now that in-person campaign activities and forms of voter outreach are being suspended to protect public health, P2P experts and campaigns tell Axios.
